title: Seapine Software Smashes the Test Automation Pricing Barrier
text:
Seapine Software smashes the automated testing price barrier with new subscription licensing and aggressive pricing .
Cincinnati, Ohio (PRWEB) September 08, 2015
Seapine Software ( http://www.seapine.com ), a leader in quality assurance and software test automation, today announced new pricing and a subscription licensing model for QA Wizard Pro, its award-winning functional test automation tool. QA Wizard Pro is used by software engineers and testers to automate the process of testing Microsoft Windows, Java-based, and web browser-based applications. The new pricing effectively removes cost as a barrier to using commercial-grade functional test automation as part of a quality assurance strategy.
“In today’s agile development environments, test automation is vitally important for maintaining the high pace of software releases,” said Rick Riccetti, Seapine Software’s president and CEO. “The high cost of test automation tools keeps them out of reach for many teams, which can affect both quality and the number of features a team can produce in a given timeframe. Today, we’re changing the calculus.”
Beginning today, Seapine will license QA Wizard Pro and its add-on components for an annual fee per user—and at a much lower entry price point. During the subscription period, customers will receive all new versions of the software and have access to Seapine’s highly-regarded technical support team. Current QA Wizard Pro customers will see no change with their existing perpetual licenses, but can now add additional licenses at a lower cost per year. Seapine has also reduced pricing for load testing virtual users and is also offering them as a subscription.
For more details about QA Wizard Pro, including pricing, visit: http://www.seapine.com/qa-wizard-pro/overview .
About Seapine Software
Seapine Software, Inc. is a privately held technology company whose application lifecycle management (ALM) solutions help companies manage the process of developing high quality complex products—often in regulated industries. Our award-winning ALM solutions drive the creation of recognized brands, life-saving medical devices, even games of the year. From a home-based startup founded in 1995, Seapine has grown into a multinational corporation with headquarters in Cincinnati, Ohio, and offices in Europe, Asia-Pacific, and Africa with over 8,500 customers worldwide.
For more information, visit http://www.seapine.com .
